shortdesc.ph: Starts direct CDN streaming on the host side.
Starts direct CDN streaming from the host.
Starts pushing streams directly from the host to the CDN.
Starts pushing the stream directly to the CDN from the host.

p.codeblock: Future<void> startDirectCdnStreaming( {required DirectCdnStreamingEventHandler eventHandler, required String publishUrl, required DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions options});
public abstract int StartDirectCdnStreaming(string publishUrl, DirectCdnStreamingMediaOptions options);

section.p:
The SDK does not support pushing streams to the same URL more than once at the same time. Media options explanation: The SDK does not support setting both publishCameraTrack and publishCustomVideoTrack to , nor both publishMicrophoneTrack and publishCustomAudioTrack to . You can configure media options () based on your scenario. For example: If you want to push custom audio and video streams collected by the host, configure the media options as follows:
Set publishCustomAudioTrack to and call
Set publishCustomVideoTrack to and call
Ensure publishCameraTrack is (default value)
Ensure publishMicrophoneTrack is (default value) Since v4.2.0, the SDK supports pushing audio-only streams. You can set publishCustomAudioTrack or publishMicrophoneTrack to in and call to push an audio-only stream.

The SDK does not support pushing streams to the same URL simultaneously. Media options: The SDK does not support setting both publishCameraTrack and publishCustomVideoTrack to , nor both publishMicrophoneTrack and publishCustomAudioTrack to . You can configure the media options () based on your scenario. For example: If you want to push custom audio and video streams from the host, set the media options as follows:
Set publishCustomAudioTrack to and call
Set publishCustomVideoTrack to and call
Ensure publishCameraTrack is (default)
Ensure publishMicrophoneTrack is (default) Since v4.2.0, the SDK supports pushing audio-only streams. You can set publishCustomAudioTrack or publishMicrophoneTrack to in and call to push audio-only streams.

The SDK does not support pushing to the same URL multiple times simultaneously. Media options: The SDK does not support publishCameraTrack and publishCustomVideoTrack being at the same time, nor does it support publishMicrophoneTrack and publishCustomAudioTrack being at the same time. You can set the media options () based on your scenario. For example: If you want to push custom audio and video streams from the host:
Set publishCustomAudioTrack to and call
Set publishCustomVideoTrack to and call
Ensure publishCameraTrack is (default)
Ensure publishMicrophoneTrack is (default) Since v4.2.0, the SDK supports pushing audio-only streams. You can set publishCustomAudioTrack or publishMicrophoneTrack to in , and call to push audio-only streams.

The SDK does not support pushing to the same URL multiple times simultaneously. Media option notes: The SDK does not support setting both publishCameraTrack and publishCustomVideoTrack to , nor does it support setting both publishMicrophoneTrack and publishCustomAudioTrack to . You can configure the media options () based on your scenario. For example: If you want to push custom audio and video streams from the host, configure the media options as follows:
Set publishCustomAudioTrack to and call
Set publishCustomVideoTrack to and call
Ensure publishCameraTrack is (default)
Ensure publishMicrophoneTrack is (default) Since v4.2.0, the SDK supports pushing audio-only streams. You can set publishCustomAudioTrack or publishMicrophoneTrack to in and call to push audio-only streams.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
